```

  port: 8761
eureka:
  client:
    registerWithEureka: false

```

```
spring:
  application:
    name: spring-cloud-eureka-client
server:
  port: 0
eureka:
  client:
    serviceUrl:
      defaultZone: ${EUREKA_URI:http://localhost:8761/eureka}
  instance:
    preferIpAddress: true
```

server:
